lines.irish: Bímse ag crochadh thart le Druids
lines.english: I hang around with Druids

lines.irish: Powder paraphernalia and fluids
lines.english: Powder paraphernalia and fluids

lines.irish: Tine cnámha, amharc suas
lines.english: Bonfire, look up

lines.irish: Ar an Ghealach, is déan fuaim
lines.english: At the Moon, and make a sound

lines.irish: Drug dealing pagans
lines.english: Drug dealing pagans

lines.irish: Human sacrifice to become famous
lines.english: Human sacrifice to become famous

lines.irish: Ní bheidh muid ag dul where the pearly gate is
lines.english: We won’t be going where the pearly gate is

lines.irish: A priest would have us locked up and sedated
lines.english: A priest would have us locked up and sedated

lines.irish: 'Cause ye can't save us
lines.english: Because you can’t save us

lines.irish: Le linn blianta fada mhór an chogaidh
lines.english: During the long years of the great war

lines.irish: Ó Iarthar Bheal Feirste siar go Taobh an Bhogaidh
lines.english: From West Belfast back to Bogside

lines.irish: Ní ghlacann sé I bhfad sula mbuaileann tú le Chucky
lines.english: Doesn’t take long before you meet Chucky

lines.irish: Blaring rebs doing a half, caitheamh siar buidéal Bucky
lines.english: Blasting rebel tunes, doing a half, downing a bottle of Bucky

lines.irish: Ní dhéanaim aon rud nach bhfuil mé ag iarraidh a dhéanamh
lines.english: I don’t do anything I don’t want to do

lines.irish: Airgead mór má tú lorg mé le canadh
lines.english: Big money if you want me to perform

lines.irish: Tabharfaidh mise aire de do mhamaí, do leanbh
lines.english: I’ll take care of your mammy and your child

lines.irish: Isteach an doras tosaigh mar is cuma faoi do bheannú
lines.english: In the front door ‘cause your blessing doesn’t matter

lines.irish: Féach, féach, nach bhfeiceann tú é?
lines.english: Look, look, don’t you see it?

lines.irish: Scaoil saor le do ghualainn is glac anáil mhór tríd do shrón
lines.english: Relax your shoulders and take a deep breath through your nose

lines.irish: Tá muid beo!
lines.english: We are alive!

lines.irish: You don't know what's going on, nobody knows what's going on, fuck it!
lines.english: You don't know what's going on, nobody knows what's going on, fuck it!

lines.irish: Sílim go gcaithfidh mé dúid, mar níl aon rud níos deise ná fear ar an bhfliút
lines.english: I think I need a toke, ‘cause nothing’s nicer than a man on the flute

lines.irish: Ag suí anseo le Manchán le cúpla magnum
lines.english: Sitting here with Manchán with a couple of Magnums

lines.irish: Ní ghlacann sé I bhfad sula dtéann siad chuig do chloigeann
lines.english: It doesn’t take long before they get into your head

lines.irish: Aeroplane mode cos there's nothing to be checkin'
lines.english: Aeroplane mode ‘cause there’s nothing to be checking

lines.irish: Ag iarraidh bheith beo fá choinne achan uile shoicind
lines.english: Trying to be alive for every single second

lines.irish: An comhrá ag éirí domhain agus snaois dul suas mo shrón
lines.english: The conversation deepening and sniff going up my nose

lines.irish: You can't buy time, you can only get a loan
lines.english: You can't buy time, you can only get a loan

lines.irish: Ach ná bí faoi bhrón it's a softboy-free zone
lines.english: But don’t be sad, it’s a softboy-free zone

lines.irish: Tá rud éigin sa spéir cos we're never alone
lines.english: There’s something in the sky ‘cause we’re never alone

lines.irish: Nach deas a bheith beo
lines.english: Isn’t it lovely to be alive

lines.irish: Ag mothú an fhuacht, ag siúl fríd an cheo
lines.english: Feeling the cold, walking through the fog

lines.irish: Maidin luath oíche mhall gan stró
lines.english: Early morning, late night without hassle

lines.irish: Mo shaol gan treo
lines.english: My life without direction

lines.irish: I came I saw, I gazed in awe
lines.english: I came I saw, I gazed in awe

lines.irish: Chonaic mé an áilleacht
lines.english: I saw the beauty

lines.irish: Tá eolas ar fáil ansin duit más maith leat
lines.english: There’s knowledge there for you if you want it

lines.irish: Cruinnigh é, ya mad cunt, sure, why not?
lines.english: Gather it, ya mad cunt, sure, why not?

lines.irish: You'll end up with a brain as big as I've got
lines.english: You’ll end up with a brain as big as I've got

lines.irish: Féach, féach, nach bhfeiceann tú é?
lines.english: Look, look, don’t you see it?

lines.irish: Scaoil saor le do ghualainn is glac anáil mhór tríd do shrón
lines.english: Relax your shoulders and take a deep breath through your nose

lines.irish: Tá muid beo!
lines.english: We are alive!

lines.irish: You don't know what's going on, nobody knows what's going on, fuck it!
lines.english: You don't know what's going on, nobody knows what's going on, fuck it!

lines.irish: Sílim go gcaithfidh mé dúid, mar níl aon rud níos deise ná fear ar an bhfliút
lines.english: I think I need a toke, ‘cause nothing’s nicer than a man on the flute

lines.irish: Ah bhaineas ana-
lines.english: Ah I really enjo-

lines.irish: Bhaineas ana thaitneamh as sin
lines.english: I really enjoyed that

lines.irish: Like, you know, you don't know what's going on
lines.english: Like, you know, you don't know what's going on

lines.irish: Nobody knows what's going on
lines.english: Nobody knows what's going on

lines.irish: Fuck it
lines.english: Fuck it

lines.irish: Sílim go gcaithfidh mé dúid mór beathaíoch ramhar, aww
lines.english: I think I need a big fat animalistic toke, aww

lines.irish: Caithfidh muid, mar ní thuigeann éinne an cac a dtuigimse
lines.english: We have to, because no one understands the shite I understand

lines.irish: Beidh mé ar stáitse libh
lines.english: I’ll be on stage with ye

lines.irish: Beidh mé fuckin' – what's it? – belly, not belly dancing
lines.english: I’ll be fuckin’ – what’s it? – belly, not belly dancing

lines.irish: Crowd surfing, sin é
lines.english: Crowd surfing, that’s it

lines.irish: Gone, le mo chíocha amuigh ar foluain go mortasach
lines.english: Gone, with my tits out floating fatally
